Introduction
This topic contains general information about the incarceration of beneficiaries and their dependents, including
definition of
incarceration
, and
conviction date
regulatory requirements for reducing or discontinuing benefits during incarceration
effect of a dependent’s incarceration on a beneficiary’s award
periods during which VA may not reduce or discontinue benefits
data-matching programs that identify incarcerated beneficiaries and dependents
, and
beneficiaries and dependents that are fugitive felons
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Effects of an Individual’s Incarceration on Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Benefits
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
